artist: Designer: Fernand Cesar Auguste Bernard James Moreau; Manufacturer: Northwestern Terra-Cotta Company (Norweta)

text: Designed for a model lamp designed by Fritz Albert; accurate measurements and condition report to be taken at Norwest Center (Wells Fargo); this object has not been at the MIA before 3/22/00; condition report at Wells Fargo 8/23/02- SED, Reg. Intern
title: Pedestal
